name: Bird Army
description:
Bird Army is a physics based arcade game.

By tapping the screen, you can make bird "Chip" fly.
Try to fly as far as possible and build an army of brother and sister baby birds to help you getting as far as possible.

Features:
- physics based flying
- 3 characters to unlock

More from Rogerty: https://rogerty.itch.io/
My Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/rogerty

Bird Army is updated! (to version 1.1.1)
Thanks for playing!

Added:
- Birds now have a trail when flying.

Changed:
- Give the player more eggs at the beginning.
- Now it's easier to unlock other characters.

Fixed:
- Sometimes no obstacles would appear for 5-10 seconds.
- Other characters could not eat eggs before this update.
- Grass would sometimes disappear.
- The game would sometimes not know the game is finished. The game is now smarter.
